thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mr Ray Kiernan
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mr Ray Kiernan

author: Mr Ray Kiernan
title: Mr Ray Kiernan
text: Life style Sports offer an excellent online services, they have a great verity of products and offer good discounts. I purchased an item on a sunday afternoon and it was delivered to my home on the monday afternoon, that is quick service. I have used their online services a few times and they keep you informed of the progress of your order.
